# read libraries
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
library(readxl)
library(gridExtra)
library(grid)
library(naniar)
```

# read data into dataframe
```{r}
wd_raw <- read.csv('welldata.csv')
str(wd_raw)
summary(wd_raw)
```

# replace -999.000 with na using naniar
```{r}
wd_clean <- wd_raw %>% replace_with_na_all(condition = ~.x == -999)
```
